languages.text: Во время, отмеченное в табеле как ночное, воздух по всему кораблю неожиданно сделался затхлым. Все, кто бодрствовал, ощутили сильнейшую усталость. Всем спящим приснились кошмары.

During the period designated as the night shift, the air throughout the ship suddenly turned stale. Those who were awake reported feeling incredibly tired. Those who were asleep later reported having horrible nightmares.
languages.original_text: Во время, отмеченное в табеле как ночное, воздух по всему кораблю неожиданно сделался затхлым. Все, кто бодрствовал, ощутили сильнейшую усталость. Всем спящим приснились кошмары.

traits.locale_text: During the graveyard shift the air suddenly became stale. Those who were awake report feeling incredibly tired. Those who were asleep report having horrible nightmares.
During the graveyard shift the air suddenly became stale. Those who were awake report feeling incredibly tired. Those who were asleep report having horrible nightmares.

During the period designated as the night shift, the air throughout the ship suddenly turned stale. Those who were awake reported feeling incredibly tired. Those who were asleep later reported having horrible nightmares.

During the period designated as the night shift, the air throughout the ship suddenly turned stale. Those who were awake reported feeling incredibly tired. Those who were asleep later reported having horrible nightmares.

languages.text: 夜班期间，整艘飞船内的空气突然变得臭不可闻。那些醒着的人报告，声称感到无比疲惫，而那些睡着的人醒来之后，报告说做了恐怖的噩梦。
languages.original_text: During the period designated as the night shift, the air throughout the ship suddenly turned stale. Those who were awake reported feeling incredibly tired. Those who were asleep later reported having horrible nightmares.

traits.locale_text: 夜班期间，整艘飞船内的空气突然变得臭不可闻。那些醒着的人报告，声称感到无比疲惫，而那些睡着的人醒来之后，报告说做了恐怖的噩梦。

languages.text: Durante el período designado como turno de noche, el aire de la cubierta se volvió rancio repentinamente. Quienes estaban despiertos han informado de cansancio extremo, mientras que quienes dormían han sufrido pesadillas espantosas.
languages.original_text: During the period designated as the night shift, the air throughout the ship suddenly turned stale. Those who were awake reported feeling incredibly tired. Those who were asleep later reported having horrible nightmares.

traits.locale_text: Durante el período designado como turno de noche, el aire de la cubierta se volvió rancio repentinamente. Quienes estaban despiertos han informado de cansancio extremo, mientras que quienes dormían han sufrido pesadillas espantosas.

languages.text: 夜勤の時間帯、船内の空気が一瞬にしてよどんだ。起きていた者はすさまじい疲労感を覚えたという。そして、眠りについていた者はひどい悪夢をみたという。
languages.original_text: During the period designated as the night shift, the air throughout the ship suddenly turned stale. Those who were awake reported feeling incredibly tired. Those who were asleep later reported having horrible nightmares.

traits.locale_text: 夜勤の時間帯、船内の空気が一瞬にしてよどんだ。起きていた者はすさまじい疲労感を覚えたという。そして、眠りについていた者はひどい悪夢をみたという。

languages.text: Während der Phase, die als Nachtschicht definiert ist, wurde die Luft im Schiff plötzlich sehr abgestanden. Wer wach war, der berichtete von einer jäh auftretenden ungeheuren Müdigkeit. Wer schlief, der berichtete von schrecklichen Albträumen.
languages.original_text: During the period designated as the night shift, the air throughout the ship suddenly turned stale. Those who were awake reported feeling incredibly tired. Those who were asleep later reported having horrible nightmares.

traits.locale_text: Während der Phase, die als Nachtschicht definiert ist, wurde die Luft im Schiff plötzlich sehr abgestanden. Wer wach war, der berichtete von einer jäh auftretenden ungeheuren Müdigkeit. Wer schlief, der berichtete von schrecklichen Albträumen.

languages.text: Lors de la période désignée comme la nuit, l'air présent dans le vaisseau devint soudain fétide. Toutes les personnes éveillées ont signalé s'être senties très fatiguées. Ceux qui ont dormi peu après ont affirmé avoir fait d'horribles cauchemars.
languages.original_text: During the period designated as the night shift, the air throughout the ship suddenly turned stale. Those who were awake reported feeling incredibly tired. Those who were asleep later reported having horrible nightmares.

traits.locale_text: Lors de la période désignée comme la nuit, l'air présent dans le vaisseau devint soudain fétide. Toutes les personnes éveillées ont signalé s'être senties très fatiguées. Ceux qui ont dormi peu après ont affirmé avoir fait d'horribles cauchemars.

languages.text: Gece vardiyası sırasında geminin havası aniden ağırlaştı. Uyanık olanlar, inanılmaz bir yorgunluk hissettiklerini bildirdi. Uyuyanlar ise daha sonra korkunç kâbuslar gördüklerini söyledi.
languages.original_text: During the period designated as the night shift, the air throughout the ship suddenly turned stale. Those who were awake reported feeling incredibly tired. Those who were asleep later reported having horrible nightmares.
